Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Comedian \Co*me"di*an\, n. [Cf. F. com['e]dien.] 1. An actor or player in comedy. ``The famous comedian, Roscius.'' --Middleton. [1913 Webster]
2. A writer of comedy. --Milton. [1913 Webster] ||
comedian n 1: a professional performer who tells jokes and performs comical acts [syn: {comic}] 2: an actor in a comedy
